title: Ping Problems
body:
Since around last week my ping has been a bit higher than normal and I have been experiencing lag during games. usually my ping was around the 10-20 mark however as of late it has jumped to around 70-120 per game and I am experiencing a annoying bit of lag.

I was wondering if this was due to problems on your end or mine, I'm with TPG if that helps.

If its a problem on my end could someone give me some advice on how to best combat it.

Thanks.

replies.body:
>10-20 mark

Are you using a VPN, or as they like to call it, 'GPN'? If so, try playing League without using it.
I don't believe i'm using VPN.

I ask because 10-20 ping is absurdly low for a consumer connection.

I guess you traded reliability for speed. TPG are known to have had connection issues with Riot's servers in the past.

Have you tried [the usual](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664), that is mainly [using an alternative DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5)?

I have been having the same problem, and i cant seem to fix it no matter what i do.
There are a lot of other people having this problem too.
